call_title: Ergo PoW Blockchain - Weekly Update & AMA - June 19th

decisions.decision: There will be two 6.0 releases: 6.0 for LevelDB and 6.1 for RocksDB
decisions.speaker: kushti
decisions.quote: Yeah, so there will be two 6.0 releases, 6.0, 6.1 probably.

decisions.decision: 6.0 will be released for LevelDB first since all mining pools are on LevelDB version
decisions.speaker: kushti
decisions.quote: So to the best of my knowledge, all the mining pools on LevelDB version, at least mining pools I will touch with. So yeah, we are going to release 6.0 in the first place.

decisions.decision: Possible to move the AMA to July 1st for the anniversary
decisions.speaker: kushti

commitments.commitment: Final 6.0 release will be today along with instructions for mining pools
commitments.quote: I think there will be final 6.0 release today, finally... along with instructions for the mining pools on how to work

commitments.commitment: Sub-blocks DevNet release call for testing probably next week
commitments.quote: sub-blocks, there will be another DevNet release call for testing DevNet probably next week

commitments.commitment: Video content will be created for the anniversary
commitments.quote: We've got Dan and at least Dan and I reached out to pixel as well to do some videos

commitments.commitment: SIGS meetup schedule will be finalized this Sunday
commitments.quote: that should be done this Sunday. We'll finalize that puppy

commitments.commitment: Can start injecting sub-blocks supporting nodes to public testnet around July
commitments.quote: So I think we can start injecting sub-blocks, supporting nodes to the public testnet around somewhat July even
